title: Pass Lucli the index to use as a command line argument
description: I made a patch to let you tell Lucli which index to use by passing it in as a command line argument. I made the change off of the 3.0 branch, wasn't sure where the best place to do it was.

comments.content: I'm pretty sure that Lucli is not part of Lucene any more, could not find it anywhere - closing!
comments.author: Jan Høydahl
